au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=L2=20m_cent_hiresMR
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(19280,0) # Drive guide to ga config driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 150 50mmEAp driveEntRotAp(150) #set sample ap to 7.5 mm sics.drive('apx', -47) # Drive beamstops up selBs(2)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(39, 100) # Drive attenuator to 240 driveAtt(240)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(39, 0) driveBsz(258.5)
